identity-providers.listExplain: Through Identity Brokering it's easy to allow users to authenticate to Keycloak using external Identity Provider or Social Networks.
identity-providers.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to permanently delete the provider '{{provider}}'
identity-providers.getStarted: To get started, select a provider from the list below.
identity-providers.createError: Could not create the identity provider provider {{error}}
